description.brief: Interface to the HighLevel Processor of the Ascending Technologies helicopters

package.description: Interfaces to the "HighLevel" Processor of the Ascending Technologies helicopters where fast IMU datafusion with arbitrary external position input and position control is executed at 1 kHz. Furthermore, all relevant data as IMU, GPS and status can be accessed at configurable rates and baudrates.
package.author: Markus Achtelik, Michael Achtelik, Stephan Weiss, Laurent Kneip

review.notes: This is unstable and under active development
